string.text: Offer assistance to the leader of the neutrals.
Talk with the commander of the outpost.

'Everybody is welcome', says a Duty guy in Garbage. 'From Dark Valley in the direction of the Bar is a wave of mutants. Anyone who will shoot those vermin, gratitude from our side is guaranteed. The word of Duty is good.'
The quest for passage to the Bar.

Demon: 'Gangster offspring trying to get control Garbage. Here about a half an hour ago there was a fight. Three freaks we have seen. Other lads are coming back and apparently will return with reinforcements. We are not to powerful and need help. If you help us destroy their reinforcements then I will be indebted.'
At the cemetery of machines, a skirmish between neutrals and bandits. Neutrals were repulsed, and they call for help.
